website_summaries.verdict: Hands down the best value. Lacks the versatility of the other Margaritaville model we tested, but a sound choice if you don't need all the bells and whistles.
pros: Portable model that offers convenient features including auto shave and blend settings and easy-pour opening
cons: Our testers found that it is somewhat challenging to take apart for cleaning

customer_reviews.title: Cheap design , Cheap materials for a lot of money.
customer_reviews.text: The one I received had a plastic green spout and gray body . The unit looked and felt cheap. I tested it out and it did not do a good job of mixing . the liquid stayed at the bottom and the ice simply floated at the top. stuck to the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money, easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: It couldn't be easier to use. Put ice on top and your flavoring on the bottom. Press the button and the ice is shaved and drops into your flavoring then the blender comes on automatically and mixes and further pulverizes the ice. Total time about 2 minutes. Want yours less watery or thicker press shave button and it makes it thicker. Want the ice extra fluffy press the blender button and its done. If there is any ice left over its drips into a removable compartment in the back and will not drip into your mix. It works great and is sturdily built
customer_reviews.author: mario r. barrera

customer_reviews.title: I really didn't think it was going to be that easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I really didn't think it was going to be that easy to use. I had some friends over and made a pitcher, put it in the freezer and made another to drink right away. All within 15 minutes. I ended up making 4 pitchers of margaritas using the Bacardi brand of frozen mix, a good brand of tequila with agave syrup and Contreau liquor. Cleanup is almost non existent. This thing comes apart within 60 seconds and goes back together in about the same time. Simply simple. If there were only a seven star selection.
customer_reviews.author: RICHRT

customer_reviews.title: The hit of the party!
customer_reviews.text: Just be careful because people are so eager to takeover making margaritas, they don't realize the ice goes in the top (ice dispenser) while the liquids go in the pitcher and then they're blended together. I made pitchers for 100 people and could keep up due to the ease of this machine. A hit all around! PS: have spare pitchers handy to pre fill for large parties!
customer_reviews.author: Discerning Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for and like the description, makes Pina Coladas just like when we go to Florida for the real deal. We do buy cream of coconut to add to them, which helps and we learned to only put a cereal bowl size of ice in as it works the best for making drinks. So far we are very happy with this purchase and have enjoyed many drinks on the porch feeling as though we were in the tropics.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Buy it if you like frozen drinks
customer_reviews.text: There are no dislikes except maybe larger blender. I have used several times using premixes such as Fat Tuesday. Just like at their outlets. Will start developing my own mixes in near future.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald H Kilmer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! Perfect pina coladas and margaritas...very easy to use, just follow recipe and the the machine the rest
customer_reviews.author: Maria Rios

customer_reviews.title: I was taken to Margaritaville and don't want to go back.
customer_reviews.text: As this aesthetically pleasing machine sits upon our counter it's shiny chrome accents call like a beacon for me to go to Margaritaville without having to leave home. The texture of the ice, the ease of use are impressive. It is great for parties or individual use.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: It makes very icy slushy drinks. Big improvement over ...
customer_reviews.text: It makes very icy slushy drinks. Big improvement over blended drinks which are more watery. One down side. I have only had this machine a few weeks and it emits a burning smell when it shaves ice. I'm hoping that it is just extra oil in a joint that will burn off, and not that the motor has an issue.
customer_reviews.author: 54InPhoenix

customer_reviews.title: Very dependable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I use this blender in my Tiki bar. It is quick and simple. It allows my bar tenders to make pitchers of frozen drinks in about 3 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Kepler mission

customer_reviews.title: Love our margarita maker
customer_reviews.text: Love our margarita maker! How simple to use... Everything id meadured out for you. Makes terrific virgin drinks too for those under age! No more running out to the convenience store for a slushy drink! Now we make them at home. A bit too big to be a fixture on the kitchen counter but i have not found the right storage place yet. Ice is smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Seller
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived much quicker than expected.. had a minor issue with a missing piece but the seller went out of their way to make it right. Love this machine!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great Frozen Margaritas
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my wife. She really likes the frozen margaritas it makes. It is easy to use, just follow the instructions or alter the recipe to your liking (add more shaved ice, etc.). It is very durable and we have had no problems with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bill OConnell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Works well and can make all kinds of non alcoholic concoctions. Easy to clean. it but it does take a lot of storage space room so I just keep it out as decoration in my living room.Makes people smile just looking at it and they start singing Jimmy Buffet's Margaritaville.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Arnot

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Makes fantastic drinks, both alcoholic and non alcoholic. I have used it to make margaritas, smoothies and frozen hot chocolate so far. It truly shaves the ice, there are no ice chunks at all in the drink. Every blender I have used before left large chunks of ice after blending but this one does not.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: The machine is fantastic! You can put as much or as little ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item after visiting friends who had one. The machine is fantastic! You can put as much or as little ice as you prefer in the machine making the drink as "thick" or "thin" as you like. It's also perfect for kids drinks, you can make them a healthy slushy with fresh fruit without all the added sugar. I highly recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: CO

customer_reviews.title: but I will adjust the margarita recipe that came with the blender ` not as tasty as I like, but who cares about that detail
customer_reviews.text: My husband became the margarita master for a party last weekend & it worked perfectly! All the reviews are accurate, but I will adjust the margarita recipe that came with the blender ` not as tasty as I like, but who cares about that detail? Great machine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Xena

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I ever made! I bought this for my boyfriend this past Christmas and it is a huge hit! We use it everytime we have company, which is A LOT! I would Highly Recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use and to clean
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and to clean. Very well blended frozen drinks. Comes with a recipe book. Has a switch to allow you to add additional ice shavings if you like thicker drinks. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: kellymack

customer_reviews.title: No Brainer is right
customer_reviews.text: This makes the best Margaritas. It is so easy.. Let me say that it again.. It is so easy!! Put everything in and push the button. It blends it to the perfect consistency all on its own.. Totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: K&J

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The ice is blended to a perfectly smooth consistency in just a few minutes. I like the ingredient cup that has marks for easy measuring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome frozen drink maker.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Shaving the ice versus chopping it up via blender makes a huge difference! Makes a perfect margarita etc. The ice part of the drink is the consistency of powder. Not sure about the science behind it, but it seemed to stay "frozen" much longer then drinks I have made with a blender. Buy it. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Savas

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted. Shaved ice, not ice chips!
customer_reviews.text: We really wanted s machine that would NOT just chip the ice. The quality of shaved ice is restaurant quality! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shelli J.

customer_reviews.title: Tacos AND Ritas ANYONE?
customer_reviews.text: Blends a perfect margarita every time! It has been the highlight of several taco nights since we purchased it. If I 'had' to say something negative it would be that some areas are hard to take a part and clean. However, overall I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This mixer is the bomb! High quality and makes wonderful drinks. The ice really turns out like a professional place would make it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product- have used it several times since Christmas and definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: chris free

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Bought one for my brother and for me
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Bought one for my brother and for me. Best mixed drink maker ever. Crushes ice so well. Also use it to make coke icees for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: rparrish

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic and can lead to serious partying - be ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift since we have owned one for 2 years. Works like magic and can lead to serious partying - be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Art H.

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: Just one of the best things ever . Have been super pleased with it .
customer_reviews.author: barkingmad

customer_reviews.title: Worked great and was in use the whole time of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a Margaritaville party and was a big hit. Worked great and was in use the whole time of the party. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: vicjo

customer_reviews.title: A necessity for entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my lakehouse and can't believe the quality of smoothie drinks this machine makes. A great investment for entertaining!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Smith

customer_reviews.title: love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Great blended drink maker, I got this for a Cinco De Mayo party and we put this think to work. it has held up pretty good so far. I like the drink mixer measurer, makes it nice and easy if you dont want to measure it out. Make a nice smooth ice that is great for tropical drinks. the feature of being able to mix more and add ice depending on how you like the thickness is nice too. got a ton of recipes from their website too. great mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Ripitywitt

customer_reviews.title: amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Use it regularly and have never had a problem with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Maas

customer_reviews.text: outstanding machine to use and the no-brainer made it super quick and easy in making the libations.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got this for christmas and I just love it. Makes great Margarita's.

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Awesome machine. Was a great Christmas present to my mother. She loves it and works great.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes the best frozen drinks. So easy to use and clean up. Thanks for the great kitchen appliance,

customer_reviews.title: My dad loved the gift
customer_reviews.text: My father has been looking for years for a way to make good homemade frozen coffee drinks. We finally went all out and got him the Margaritaville Frozen concoction maker which he loves.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This makes the best margairitas I have had. The perfect drink macdhine

customer_reviews.text: It is a great product - easy to use and clean.

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE it! Not only can you make frozen drinks for the adults BUT you can also make slushies for the kids! It shaves the ice and I have yet to get any little ice chunks. It is so easy...push a button and you are done.

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job! I recommend a second pitcher if your ...
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job! I recommend a second pitcher if your making drinks for a crowd

customer_reviews.title: Try it, you will like it!

customer_reviews.title: but we love our Margaritaville we have had for years
customer_reviews.text: This was a wedding gift, but we love our Margaritaville we have had for years. Make a great Margarita!

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great drink maker! You have to make sure the ice pieces aren't too big so that they can feed into the machine. Blends drinks very nicely.

customer_reviews.title: Margarita night at home now!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It makes wonderful margaritas. I would recommend chilling the blender before using the product so that the mixture will stay frozen longer.

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER 5 MONTHS! BUY A BLENDER INSTEAD
customer_reviews.text: I loved it when it was working! I've had this product for about 5 months then all the sudden the part that crushes the ice quit working. So now I basically have a way over priced blender!

customer_reviews.title: Jimmy couldn't do it better himself
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product, looks and works just as expected, and is the talk of all your outdoor parties!

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says. Restaurant quality margaritas made at home. The no brainer mixer makes it easy but we add an extra shot of tequila to give it a kick.

customer_reviews.title: It made our piña coladas better than the beach cabana bartender
customer_reviews.text: Took the machine on vacation. It made our piña coladas better than the beach cabana bartender. And we made shaved ice treats for the kids with flavors we brought along. It really is a well made machine and performs great.

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine! 😍 The margaritas are perfect. We used it for the first time when my brother was over and we had 5 pitchers! Definately recommend buying this machine.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! Easy to use and comes out perfect every time!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful machine! A woman must have designed it !!!!! Really great love it

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome machine for making margaritas
customer_reviews.text: What more is there to say? This is an awesome machine for making margaritas. The blender is really high quality and we use it for more than making frozen drinks. The only down side is the recipe book they give, I am not a fan of orange juice in my frozen margaritas. Just buy some uncle dicks margarita mix, triple sec and a decent agava tequila and mix with that, it doesn't need anything else except salt and a lime wedge on the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! The texture of ice is spot on
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The texture of ice is spot on, its quick and easy you can make a Margarita when partiers stop by. I am thrilled with my Concoction maker.

customer_reviews.text: I Love this Thing!!! and so do all my friends! So easy to use and clean! Best thing I ever got from Amazon!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to use and a yummy concoction comes out every time!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Moitozo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect machine for iced blended drinks
customer_reviews.text: Perfect machine for iced blended drinks. Bought as a retirement present for the front office lady who is not a big fan of complex machines. She loved this thing put the ice in the top put the mix in the pitcher and press the big button on the front the rest is automated or you can use the toggle switch to do it all manually. First night of use 10lbs of ice ran through this thing it perfect for the hot summer. In addition build quality is very good there is a fair amount of plastic but its not cheap thin plastic its thicker stronger stuff.
customer_reviews.author: LSH

customer_reviews.title: Margarittaville Bahama Frozen Concoction Maker.
customer_reviews.text: Makes delicious drinks. Just need to experiment with it to get the drinks the texture you like it. We love it.

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this machine to anyone who enjoys frozen beverages
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this machine to anyone who enjoys frozen beverages. We have only used this machine for alcoholic drinks but I read that is makes great smoothies as well. We've had ours for a few years now and it still works like a charm and trust me, it gets used! We break it out for every party, every vacation and sometimes, just because. My only warning would be that the drinks are so good and go down so well, that that you might want to keep it boxed up on work nights because it can be dangerous! Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Makes Luau-day much easier
customer_reviews.text: Love this - so much easier, and so much less mess, when making frozen drinks for summer parties. I don't really use the no-brainer mixer part, though; instead, I make large pitchers already mixed of the various drink concoctions, and keep them in the fridge. Then I can just pour the right amount right in. That way it literally only takes a few minutes to make a fresh batch, and I spend a lot less time slaving over the bar on Luau day. BTW: this is perfect for making non-alcoholic frozen drinks for the kids, too. (Just give it a rinse if the last batch you made did contain alcohol.)
customer_reviews.author: Kim Beall

product_meta.title: Margaritaville Bahamas Frozen Concoction Maker & No-Brainer Mixer
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Single

Make a perfect pitcher of margaritas or other frozen drinks in one easy step. view larger Capture that casual island attitude. MARGARITAVILLE BAHAMAS FROZEN CONCOCTION MAKER WITH NO-BRAINER MIXER -- DM0600
THE ONLY FROZEN DRINK MAKER WITH SHAVED ICE
Nothing captures that casual islands attitude quite like a Bahamas Frozen Concoction Maker. Mon oh mon, does it ever keep the icy cold drinks flowing. Put it on "Shave 'n Blend," and it automatically churns out a full, 36-ounce pitcher of frozen drinks as good as any you'll ever get in a restaurant. If you want to put your own spin on the concoction, use the custom "shave only" or "blend only" setting. You'll be sipping on a slice of paradise in no time. It's better with the Bahamas Frozen Concoction Maker.

HIGHLIGHTS:
 * The only frozen drink maker that shaves ice--instead of crushing/pulverizing
 * Make a 36-ounce frozen drink in one easy step with the automatic "Shave 'n Blend" cycle
 * Customize the consistency of drinks using the manual "shave only" or "blend only" setting
 * The blending jar really lasts--it's high-quality, dishwasher-safe, and shatter-proof
 * Forget about watery, slushy drinks because melting ice is channeled away

A TROPICAL BREEZE TO USE
NO-BRAINER MIXER
Designed with markings up the side, the included No-Brainer mixer makes it easy to add the right ingredients for pina coladas, daiquiris, margaritas, and more. After measuring in the ingredients, release into the blending jar, and you're well on your way.

AUTO OR MANUAL MODE
Press "start" to employ the automatic "Shave 'n Blend" cycle, which uses a sharp shaving paddle to finely and evenly shave ice from the reservoir. Additional sharp blades in the blending jar pulverize all the ingredients to perfection.

For manual control, there's a handy "blend only/shave only" toggle switch, which lets you add more ice--and blend it as long as you want.

SHATTER-PROOF PLASTIC BLENDING JAR
The Bahamas Frozen Concoction Maker provides a durable Shatter-proof Plastic blending jar with a roomy 36-ounce capacity, measuring marks up the side, and a generous easy-grip handle. Both the No-Brainer mixer and the blending jar/lid are dishwasher-safe for quick cleanup.
